information: The maximum number of points is 15. Those are the cross-code-review and cross-check criterias:

criteria.text: Linting can be run and doesn't produce any errors or warnings
Tests can be run and the test coverage is equal or higher than 80%
Value from search input is saved in the app store (should be restored from the store when navigating back to the search page)
Search results are saved in the app store (should be restored when navigating back to the search page)
Each form submission is saved in the app store *should be restored when havigating back to the form page)
Api calls are made using RTK Query (or thunks)
Code smells (god component, a lot of duplication)
A lot of comments (commented code blocks, redundant comments, etc)
Errors in console in dev tools, 2 per each
Warnings in console in dev tools, 1 per each
